name: One Soul, Many Lives
description:
A short videogame made for the Wowie Jam 3.0, where the topic was "FAILURE IS PROGRESS".

Possess robots and use them to go up a mountain, dying and switching bodies when necessary.

CONTROLS

Body:

  • W / Up arrow: Jump.
  • S / Down arrow: Die and release your spirit.
  • A / Left Arrow: Move to the left
  • D / Right arrow: Move to your right.

Spirit:

  • W / Up arrow: Move up.
  • S / Down arrow: Move down.
  • A / Left Arrow: Move to the left.
  • D / Right arrow: Move to your right.
